ygData.msgSnippet: It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, the language woke Shokaract from his trance, not the missile. He transformed into robot mode and beckoned Hell Drak to come

It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, the language woke Shokaract from his tr=
ance, not the missile. He transformed into robot mode and beckoned Hell Dra=
k to come closer with a movement of his hand...

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  S=
ent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 11:19 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Sh=
okaract


  Hell Drak avoided the missile.
   
  "Not this time, fucko!" He=
ll Drak yelled, firing a lazer back at Shokaract.
    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:53 PM
    Subject: Re: Attack=
!/Orion/Shokaract


    The lasers his Shokaract all 4 times, but he didn't=
 seem to notice, he was fixated on some thing only he could see, something =
from his own mind. Ahh! PSYCHO! Shokaract fires a single missile back at He=
ll Drak...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Testifier: Abys=
sian Badass 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, Septe=
mber 12, 2001 9:29 PM
      Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


      ::=
Headshot/Hell Drak/Triggerhappy::
       
      Headshot ducked by a tree. =
 One of Orion's shots nailed him in the side.
       
      "Ah, f***!!!!!!=
!" Headshot yelled, holding his side in pain, getting up from being knocked=
 down.
       
      Headshot climbed up into the tree, and fired a sniper =
shot at Orion.  Headshot was standing up, so, if he was hit......(hint hint=
!)
      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Hell Drak was hit by the two missiles.  She =
went flying back into a wall.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at Shokaract.
     =
 ~~~~~~~~
      Triggerhappy flew out of the way of Orion's shots.  Trigger=
happy flew down, attempting to ram right into Orion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
!!

ice. 



    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Se=
rvice. 


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Ser=
vice.
